parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Unregisters a task type from given agent. The task type is the name given in <tt>CfgTasks</tt> classes in <tt>name</tt> property. Also available from [[registeredTasks]] array.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> teamMember '''unregisterTask''' name

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> teamMember: [[Team Member]] - [[teamMember]] [[agent]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - name of the task

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] on success

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[teamMember]] _agent [[unregisterTask]] ([[registeredTasks]] [[select]] 0);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[registerTask]],[[registeredTasks]], [[sendTask]], [[createTask]], [[currentTasks]], [[taskCompleted]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
